name: Long Live Felony Melanie Online Trivia | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Melanie's fiancé in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
questions.explanation:
Andrew.

	Andrew Hennings is played by Patrick Dempsey.

questions.text: What relation did Bobby Ray say he was to Melanie in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
What song deserves respect in Pigeon Creek in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
What does Andrew's mother do for a living in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
questions.explanation:
Mayor of New York.

	Mayor Hennings is played by Candice Bergen.

questions.text: Jake and Melanie's dog Bryant died in "Sweet Home Alabama".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Jake and Melanie's dog Bear died while Melanie was in New York.

questions.text: Who played Jake's mother in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
Melanie used the spare key to get into the house after Jake locked her out in "Sweet Home Alabama".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Jake (about the spare key): 'That's the thing about hide-a-keys. It'd be nice if your wife told you where it was.'

questions.text: Melanie's mother came to get Melanie when she was thrown in jail in "Sweet Home Alabama".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Melanie's father, Earl (Fred Ward), came to retrieve her from jail just as he did in the past.

questions.text: What animal did Melanie strap dynamite to in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
questions.explanation:
cat.

	Jake explained to Andrew that Old Fuzz had cancer. Melanie didn't want to cat to be put to sleep so they strapped dynamite to its back so it would blow up. The cat wandered into town and ended up in the bank. The bank blew up but people said they still see Old Fuzz wandering around with her tail scorched.

questions.text: As the credits were rolling in "Sweet Home Alabama", Jake and Melanie's daughter was shown.
questions.explanation:
True.

	While the credits were rolling, pictures were shown of what happened after the wedding. Two pictures of Jake, Melanie and their daughter were shown.

questions.text: What weather phenomenon turns sand into a formation in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
options: sand can't be turned into glass
questions.explanation:
lightning.

	Lightning turns sand into a formation. Jake uses lightning rods to cause lightning to strike and then he turns the formations into glass sculptures.

questions.text: How old were Melanie and Jake when they became soulmates in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
questions.explanation:
10 years old.

	Jake (lying): "Nobody finds their soulmate when their ten years old."

questions.text: After Melanie's drunken tirade in "Sweet Home Alabama", Jake signed the divorce papers.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Jake signed them after Melanie got drunk at his mother's bar. Melanie hadn't signed them which was brought out on her walk down the aisle.

questions.text: Who did Andrew end up marrying in "Sweet Home Alabama"?
questions.explanation:
Erin Vanderbilt.

	Melanie's friend showed Melanie the engagement announcement in the paper while the credits were rolling. Erin Vanderbilt was in several scenes of the movie but was edited out when TPTB decided they wanted Andrew not to be hiding the fact that he had an affair with her.

questions.text: In the DVD version of "Sweet Home Alabama", there was an alternate ending to the movie.
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jake and Melanie planned a practical joke on their family and friends making them think Melanie had been killed. When the joke was revealed then Melanie asked for a slow song and they danced. The alternate ending didn't work with viewers because it wasn't funny so it hit the cutting room floor.
